dict.acceptation: 方便的；[废语]适当的；[口语]近便的；实用的；

sent.orig: Convenient tools for managing search results: deleting, copying, moving found files. 6.
sent.trans: convenient的工具，管理的搜索结果：删除，复制，移动找到的文件。

sent.orig: While there are other, superior, dive sites in Thailand, Pattaya is the most convenient to Bangkok.
sent.trans: 当然泰国还有其他更棒的潜水点，但从芭堤雅前往首都曼谷是最便捷的。

sent.orig: This made it very convenient for testing performance of switching power supply at step load.
sent.trans: 这种模式很方便用来开关电源的动态负载测试。

sent.orig: You can have your breakfast whenever convenient to you.
sent.trans: 你可以在对你合适的任何时间吃早餐。

sent.orig: Would tomorrow be convenient for you?
